required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: FS118 First in Human Study in Patients With Advanced Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1/2, Open-Label, First-in-Human Study to Evaluate the Safety and Anti-Tumor Activity of FS118, a LAG-3/PD-L1 Bispecific Antibody, in Patients With Advanced Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: This study will be conducted in adult participants diagnosed with advanced tumors to characterize the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics (PK), and activity of FS118. This is a Phase 1/2, multi-center, open-label, multiple-dose, first-in-human study, designed to systematically assess safety and tolerability, to identify the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and/or recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) for FS118 in participants with advanced tumors and to determine the efficacy of FS118 in participants with squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck (SCCHN). Pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, immunogenicity, and response will also be assessed.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Incidence of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
primary_outcome.description: Incidence, severity and duration of adverse events will be assessed by CTCAEv4.03

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Serum Concentration vs time profile of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (concentrations measured in mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Maximum Serum Concentration of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Cmax measured in mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Time to reach maximum serum concentration (Tmax) of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Tmax measured in hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Trough serum concentration (Ctrough) of FS118 prior to the next dose
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Ctrough measured in mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Area under the serum FS118 concentration vs time Curve (AUC)
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (AUC measured in d.mcg/mL)

primary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Systemic Clearance (CL) of FS118
primary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (CL measured in mL/day)

primary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Disease control rate as assessed by RECIST 1.1 in evaluable participants with PD-L1 and LAG-3 positive SCCHN

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose escalation: Disease Response as assessed by RECIST 1.1 and iRECIST
Dose escalation: Incidence of FS118 immunogenicity
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of FS118 immunogenicity will include ADA detection and analysis (incidence measured in titre)

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Disease Response as assessed by RECIST 1.1 and iRECIST in all SCCHN participants
Expansion cohort: Incidence of Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (Safety and Tolerability)
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence, severity and duration of adverse events will be assessed by CTCAEv4.03

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Maximum Serum Concentration of FS118
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Cmax measured in mcg/mL)

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Time to reach maximum serum concentration (Tmax) of FS118
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Tmax measured in hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Trough serum concentration (Ctrough) of FS118 prior to the next dose
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (Ctrough measured in mcg/mL)

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Area under the serum FS118 concentration vs time Curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (AUC measured in d.mcg/mL)

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion cohort: Systemic Clearance (CL) of FS118
secondary_outcome.description: Blood samples for serum PK analysis will be obtained (CL measured in mL/day)

clinical_study.condition: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head and Neck

arm_group.description: The initial cohorts will enroll sequentially as single-participant cohorts. If no DLT or ≥Grade 2 study drug related adverse event is observed, then dosing will proceed in a 3+3 design followed by an expansion cohort of participants with SCCHN.

intervention.description: Dosing of participants will occur intravenously (IV) weekly in 3-week treatment cycles until iCPD (i.e., immune confirmed progressive disease), unacceptable toxicity, or discontinuation.

condition_browse.mesh_term: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head and Neck
